_sText:
zm_FireWaLL_Samarkand
=====================
by FireWavezZ
-------------

This map is a remake of a city in the game silkroad online. its an asian/islamic town located on the trade routes. 
map is made for FireWaLL zombie server, [www.FireWaLLCS.net](http://firewallcs.net/ "http://firewallcs.net/")
IP: **206.212.243.130:27015 **

### Some info
- 64 spawn points over the map
- custom props
- custom textures
- secret teleports
- secret rooms
- 3 special weapons
- anti tubecampers
- acces to 3d skybox

I hope you like the map, there will come a bomb/defuse version aswell i think.
Thanks to FireWaLL server and members

### More Screenshots
